page.title:
Motivation
Motivation
page.enlisting:
• Measure neutrino cross-section with better than 10% • Utilize existing detectors (MicroBooNE, ICARUS) • Minimize initial investment. Providing a suitable building to house the detector would be the only investment required • Describe possible improvements in collecting and storing • Provide a suitable test facility for future NF • Measure neutrino cross-section with better than 10%
• Measure neutrino cross-section with better than 10%
